# Welcome to My Digital Hub!

I'm Charles (Charlie) Peterson, a Senior HPC System Administrator at UCLA and an independent researcher in computational chemistry.

## My Role and Research

At UCLA, I drive the optimization of HPC systems, collaborating with diverse research teams to ensure their work is empowered by reliable and powerful computing resources. In my independent research, I delve into computational chemistry, focusing on nuclear forensics and separation chemistry. My dual focus on system administration and theoretical research fuels my commitment to technological and scientific progress.

## Connect with Me

Interested in collaborating or learning more? Reach out to me at [charles.c.peterson3@gmail.com](mailto:charles.c.peterson3@gmail.com).

Let's innovate together!
